name: AMAI
description: AMAI (Autonomous Multi-Agent Intelligence) is a decentralized ecosystem that enables the creation, coordination, and capitalization of autonomous AI agents on-chain. AMAI introduces a programmable framework where agents can act as wallets, execute strategies, and form “Smart Swarms” that collaborate autonomously. The protocol focuses on establishing on-chain trust through bonded staking and behavioral reputation. AMAI’s mission is to build a “machine-first economy,” where intelligent agents can earn, spend, and create value without centralized control.
